Dating: BYZANTINE PERIOD (not before); BYZANTINE PERIOD ?; COPTIC PERIOD (not after)
Name: Phial
Description: This beautiful phial in yellowish terracotta was part of the G. Hagemans collection. The belly is ornamented by a known motif of Saint Menas as orant, the head surrounded by two crosses, and in the company of two camels resting at his feet. The intact piece dates from the 6th or the 7th century
